definition: the storm put strong grass to the test, fire tests true gold (idiom); fig. troubled times test a faithful minister/to show one's true colors after a stern test
pinyin: ji2 feng1 zhi1 jin4 cao3 , lie4 huo3 jian4 zhen1 jin1
traditional: 疾風知勁草，烈火見真金
word: 疾风知劲草，烈火见真金

definition: ardent/intense/fierce/stern/upright/to give one's life for a noble cause/exploits/achievements
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
